Class TrianaColorModel

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.trianacode.gui.components.triana.TrianaColorModel

    public class TrianaColorModel
extends java.lang.Object
implements NodeColorModel, CableColorModel, BackgroundColorModel, TrianaColorConstants
